column1: Little Goat Diner////They have an interesting concept
column2: lots of unique dishes you won't see at other restaurants. I had the bull's eye french toast which was great
column3: my wife had the spaghetti and clams which was pretty good. Little goat latte was flavorful but kinda heavy. Pork and toffee shake was a bit expensive but worth trying. Our waiter was very courteous and attentive. The wait can get pretty long so plan ahead
